titleStmt.title: [Mataiobrachytēs tou biou] The brevity and vanity of man's life : discovered in a sermon preached at the funerals of Mrs. Ellen Hartcourt, youngest daughter to the virtuous and excellent Lady Cony of Stoke in Lincolnshire, who was interr'd in Saint Andrews-Holborn-Church, March 23, 1661, being married that day five weeks before / by Richard Henchman.
titleStmt.author: Henchman, Richard.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Roycroft for William Grantham ...

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
